rows.label: tlk70000072_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Macmac understand why Morumo
popular. Always supported shopping
ward through day and night, after all.

rows.label: tlk70000072_01_msg0002
rows.name:
But Macmac worry that Morumo
becoming teensy bit too powerful.
And trying too hard to be cool leader.

rows.label: tlk70000072_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Overworking make nobody happy, only
bring pain. But admitting that not easy,
so often start making silly justifications.

rows.label: tlk70000072_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Macmac think people usually happier
if not being super cool. Maybe is better
to be little bit uncool actually.

rows.label: tlk70000072_01_msg0005
rows.name:
So what Morumo need right now
maybe not stacks of money.

rows.label: tlk70000072_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Me think Morumo need somebody to
talk open and honest with. Someone to
give big slap when Morumo being silly!

rows.label: tlk70000072_01_msg0101
rows.name:
Also, what happen to Red Pollen Orbs?
If just left lying around, that fine, but if
pick up and sell off, is crime and insult!
